nodes.text: The Profusion was a Lucrehulk-class Battleship in service to the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. In 19 BBY, it took part in the Battle of Coruscant, where it acted as a frigate. After General Grievous escaped the Invisible Hand aboard an escape pod, the Profusion recovered his pod.

The Profusion first appeared, albeit unnamed, in the 2005 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. Although the 2017 reference book, Star Wars: On the Front Lines, states that the Profusion is a "Separatist frigate," the 2016 reference book, Star Wars: Complete Locations, explicitly elaborates that the vessel is a Lucrehulk-class Battleship, and not a Munificent-class star frigate.
